name: MOTHER TERESA RURAL EDUCATIONAL DEVELOPMENT CHARITABLE SOCIETY
briefDescription: The Mother Teresa Rural Educational Development Charitable Society Registered, under Societies Act and PWD Act and working for the DifferentlyAbled Persons and Welfare of weaker sections since decade with the support from Local Government and Government of India. We arew regularly working with PVP, VKT, DRDA, TAHDCO, TNCWD, Disabled Welfare Dept., Tamilnadu and CAPART (Govt. of India)and overseas fund @ CARITAS INDIA. nearly 5000 people were benefitting each year
